product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner design features a spacious square layout with a soft, pastel green background enriched by curved wave shapes and translucent abstract circles, adding depth and elegance. At its core, it showcases a high-quality product image ("product_image") of a brown tote bag with gold embellishments, prominently placed at the center. The top section displays a headline ("heading") in a sleek, modern sans-serif font surrounded by a secondary line of supporting text ("subheading"). Below the bag, a product highlight message ("description") and price ("price") are displayed with bold emphasis, followed by a defined rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_background") with a centered text layer ("cta"). 

**Color Palette:**
- Mint Green: #bde9c9
- Forest Green: #28572a
- Deep Green: #027223
- Black: #000000
- White: #FFFFFF
- Tan Brown (Product Bag)
product_color: The product showcases a rich tan brown leather handbag with an elegant and luxurious aesthetic. The primary color used is a warm **tan brown** (#A37054), which conveys sophistication and earthiness. Accents of **metallic gold** (#D4AF37) are found on the hardware, charms, and brand logo, providing a refined contrast that highlights the details while blending smoothly into the overall tone. The textured surface adds depth and subtle variation to the brown, giving it visual interest without breaking uniformity. This harmonious blend of warm neutrals and luxe gold makes the image visually balanced yet eye-catching—ideal for a high-end, minimalist advertisement banner.
